greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fractalization of Pi.
comment: Self-descriptive sequence: even terms are the sequence itself, odd terms are the digits of the decimal expansion of Pi.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(2n) = a(n); a(2n-1) = digits of Pi.
results.author: _Alexandre Wajnberg_, Sep 15 2005
ext: a(85) corrected and formula fixed by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 29 2014
